jsonconfig-bad-json: Text on the page is not in a valid JSON format, and there is not much more we can do with it.
jsonconfig-duplicate-field: Field ($1) was present more than once but with different capitalization in the JSON, e.g. "field" and "Field". Parameters: * $1 - field name
jsonconfig-err-bool: A field named "$1" is not a valid boolean
jsonconfig-err-string: A field named "$1" is not a valid string
jsonconfig-err-integer: A field named "$1" is not a valid integer
